title: Confused on viktor nerfs.
body: I'm just wondering... why was viktor nerfed? He has a 46.73% win rate right now. You nerfed him enough in my opinion when you nerfed the ratios on his Cores. Can anyone find a decent reason to why viktor was nerfed? I sure can't.

replies.body: I read somewhere it was because after his first or second back he could clear entire minion waves with his E

hmmm 

Patch 4.12 notes http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-412-notes
Ahri
Q does a little more damage and costs less mana.  

Ahri's a cool fox gal that we'd like to see more of, but she's currently sitting just below the top-tier mid picks. That said, we don't think she needs too many buffs to keep up, so we focused on her ability to push the wave more efficiently so she can find more opportunities to roam.
Q - Orb of Deception
COST 70/75/80/85/90 mana ⇒ 55/60/65/70/75 mana
ABILITY POWER RATIO 0.325 (total: 0.65) ⇒ 0.35 (total: 0.7)

They straight up buffed her so she could clear waves round the same time. Only thing done to Q since than was the addition of the movement speed.

They are hitting VIk because he sees some LCS play as a mage who can weave clear and counter the all in of flashy assassins
Yep. With just the first hex core you could clear almost the entire wave

too much wave clear, he had a very safe early game after his first core cus it let him one shot caster minions. plus his wave clear late game made it very good to stop sieges, wasn't even that big of a nerf

Yeah he has insane wave clear because he doesn't have mobility.....Look at lux after her back she can clear a wave easily combined with her passive.  I have a feeling Riot nerfs and buffs champs to rotate their usage so we don't see the same champs every game in solo que and Lcs. ex Random Xin buffs
lux has to auto attack every single minion to wave clear, not shoot a laser and done.
Yeah so does Vikotr? I play him alot of times early game caster minions will live with like 10 health and teh melee minions dont die either from the laser? Lux has just as much wave clear.
you're not playing him right then
You obviously dont play Viktor sometimes when you get caught between a level up between you and the minions the casters will live with like 10 health. Look it up
i've played viktor and never had a problem wave clearing, if it lives with 10 health it's because of the nerfs genius
